pages.text: 26|3|Şojad mexohī az [anduhi] in ki [muşrikon] imon nameovarand, xudro halok kunī
26|4|Agar ʙixohem, az osmon nişonae ʙar onon nozil mekunem, ki dar ʙaroʙaraş ʙo furūtanī sar furud ovarand
26|5|Va heç pandi tozae az sūi [Allohi] Rahmon ʙaroi onon nameojad, magar in ki az on rūj gardonand
26|6|Ba rostī, onon [da'vati pajomʙaron va azoʙi qijomatro] durūƣ angoştand, pas, ʙa zudī axʙori on ci masxara mekardand, ʙa eşon xohad rasid
26|7|Ojo ʙa zamin namenigarand, ki ci ʙisjor az har guna [gijohi] sudmande dar on rūjonidaem
26|8|Be tardid, dar in [ofariniş] nişonae [az qudrati Alloh taolo ʙar meod] ast, vale ʙeştaraşon imon nameovarand
26|9|Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat şikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
26|10|Va [jod kun az] hangome ki Parvardigorat Mūsoro nido dod, ki: «Ba sūji qavmi sitamgor ʙirav
26|11|– qavmi Fir'avn - [va ʙa onon ʙigū] ojo [az kufru sarkaşī] nameparhezand?»
26|12|[Mūso] Guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙim doram, ki maro durūƣgū angorand
26|13|Va [az kufraşon noşikeʙo va] ƣamgin gardam. Pas, [Çaʙrailro] ʙa sūji Horun ʙifrist [to ʙaroi joriam rahsiporaş kunad]
26|14|Va onon [ʙa gumoni xeş qasosi] gunohe ʙar man dorand, pas, metarsam, ki maro ʙikuşand»
26|15|[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Hargiz! Pas ʙo ojot [va mu'çizot]-i Mo ʙiraved. Jaqinan, [hama ço] ʙo şumoem va [guftugūjatonro] meşunavem
26|16|Pas, nazdi Fir'avn ʙiraved va ʙigūed: «Mo firistodai Parvardigori çahonijon hastem
26|17|[Ū mefarmojad] Ki Bani Isroilro hamrohi mo ʙifirist»
26|18|[Fir'avn] guft: «Ojo turo dar kūdakī mijoni xeş parvariş nadodem va solhoe az umratro ʙajni mo naʙudī
26|19|Va kori xudro – cunon ki xostī – kardī [va on mardi qiʙtiro kuştī] va tu [nisʙat ʙa ne'mathoi man] nosiposī?!»
